reviewText: This is a great collection of classic monster films on Blu-ray.  The transfers are great, and 12 hours of special features are included.  A must have for classic horror fans!
Title: N/A

reviewText: These are the very best of the Universal Monster movies, they were wonderfully restored film in the visual and the sound quality. I am so happy I bought these films it has been so fun to rewatch these movies!
summary: The Best of the Universal Monsters
Title: N/A

reviewText: Wow... a set of my favorite movies on Blu Ray and transferred in a way that makes them even more gorgeous to watch. If you love these movies, get this set!
Title: N/A

reviewText: I got the UK version cause its cheaper, the movies are the same, and I was shocked at how well Dracula looked. The Mummy so far was like the really old days. They are awesome Blu Rays, its so nice to see these movies like they were just made. Kudos to Universal for a job well done.
summary: WOW is all i can say
Title: N/A

reviewText: I bought this as a gift for my boyfriend who is a huge fan of these movies. He absolutely loved this collection! Its very well done the box set comes with a bunch of extras on top of the movie quality being excellent. I would highly recommend this box set its priced much lower than any other comparable set and the quality of it doesn't suffer for it.
summary: Can't go wrong for this price!
Title: N/A

reviewText: When I saw this set come out I groaned. I already own the excellent Legacy Collections of Dracula, Frankenstien and Wolfman. I couldn't justify the $100 price tag. Fast forward ... a few cocktails ... amazon .. price dropped  ... I own it.IT WAS WORTH EVERY PENNY !Watching the blu-ray transfer of Frankenstien for the first time with my daughter (who was seeing it for the first time) was a revelation. It's not just a better copy, it's like a whole new movie. I'm not dumping my Legacy DVD's because they have 5 movies apiece but I don't see me watching ANYTHING on those disks if I can watch it here. I don't think these looked this good in the theater back in the day. Truly amazing.
Title: N/A
